content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for automation research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 5920.
- ElectricityGroup with id=5920 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours include adjacent pipes.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_systems: [21092].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_systems: [21092].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=21092; status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=21093; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=21094; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=21099; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=21098; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=21103; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=21102; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=21105; status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System ID Mismatch:
   - Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [20748, 20791, 20834, 20877, 20920, 20963, 21006, 21049] failed. Verify and select the active fluid_system (e.g., 21092 as currently available) to ensure a working PipeGroup is targeted.
   
• Pipeline Stabilization Strategy:
   - Reliance on a fixed 10-second delay has not facilitated a successful connection. Implement dynamic readiness checks for pipeline stability before reattempting connection operations.
